item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 18 Jan 2022
item.description:
1. Blog post: Writing a Game Boy emulator in OCaml
  2. Bogue, the OCaml GUI
  3. V3.ocaml.org: getting ready to launch
  4. New release of Windows DKML with system compiler and easy Opam switch creation
  5. Cross-compiling OCaml with GitHub Actions
  6. First announcement of Bechamel
  7. An Update on the State of the PPX Ecosystem and ppxlib's Transition
  8. Become an Outreachy Mentor: support the growth and diversity of the OCaml community
  9. Cmon 0.1, a printer that shares
